description:
Commander Jonathan sets a Straw Hat trap, but Luffy and Sanji are willing to risk it all to help spring their mates. Will a souvenir from the sky save the day - or will their escape plan be scuttled by foul play?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kesshi no Luffy to Sanji! Kyuushutsu Dai Sakusen!
La détermination de Luffy et Sanji ! Le grand plan de sauvetage !
Luffy and Sanji`s Daring Rescue Mission!
¡La crucial decisión de Luffy y Sanji! ¡Una gran maniobra de rescate!
Решение Луффи и Санджи! Грандиозный план побега!
جرأة لوفي وسانجي! عمليّة الإنقاذ العظيمة!
ลูฟี่กับซันจิสู้ตาย! ยุทธการช่วยเหลือ!
決死のルフィとサンジ! 救出大作戦!
